titleStmt.title: A modest answer to Dr. Dove's sermon, preached at Bow-Church before the Lord Mayor and court of Aldermen, on the day for the election of a Lord Mayor.

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Dove, Henry. Sermon preached before the Right Honorable the Lord Mayor of the City of London, and the court of Aldermen.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
